description: Detects the creation or update of a scheduled task to run with "NT AUTHORITY\SYSTEM" privileges
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
name: Schtasks Creation Or Modification With SYSTEM Privileges
query: ((process.executable.text:"*\\schtasks.exe" AND process.command_line.text:("*\ \/change\ *" OR "*\ \/create\ *") AND process.command_line.text:"*\/ru\ *" AND process.command_line.text:("*NT\ AUT*" OR "*\ SYSTEM\ *")) AND (NOT (((process.parent.executable.text:"*\\AppData\\Local\\Temp\\*" AND process.parent.executable.text:"*TeamViewer_.exe*" AND process.executable.text:"*\\schtasks.exe" AND process.command_line.text:"*\/TN\ TVInstallRestore*")) OR (process.command_line.text:("*\/Create\ \/F\ \/RU\ System\ \/SC\ WEEKLY\ \/TN\ AviraSystemSpeedupVerify\ \/TR\ *" OR "*C\:\\Program\ Files\ \(x86\)\\Avira\\System\ Speedup\\setup\\avira_speedup_setup.exe*" OR "*\/VERIFY\ \/VERYSILENT\ \/NOSTART\ \/NODOTNET\ \/NORESTART\"\ \/RL\ HIGHEST*")))))
